title: snowday malz recall animation is bugged
body:
in the recall the poro he summons is just a blue blob. maybe not blob,but an all blue poro
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Va1rt1w.png[/img]

replies.body: Someone else who plays malz and has this skin <3 im not the only one lmao

Hey Tas Since 93 - 

Thanks for the report! This is a missing texture - we're in the process of locating him and getting it back into the game. ^-^
